questions.question_text:
When creating a PDF Document template, the Document revision field must be completed.
How does the system determine which documents are available to be selected for this field?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-employee-service-management/page/product/human-resources/task/PDFTemplate.html

Note: User group and document owner determine what revisions are available to view or select.
